Title: Applies certain provisions of the environmental conservation law to certain oil-fired electric generating facilities
Summary: Applies certain provisions of the environmental conservation law to all predominately oil-fired electric generating facilities over one hundred megawatts.
LawCode: Add ยง73, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the application of certain provisions of the environmental conservation law to all predominately oil-fired electric generating facilities over one hundred megawatts
